scripts.new-blog:
read -p 'Blog title: ' title && date=$(date +'%Y-%m-%d') && slug=$(echo "$title" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | sed 's/[^a-z0-9]/-/g' | sed 's/--*/-/g' | sed 's/^-\|-$//g') && filename="app/blog/${date}-${slug}.md" && if [ -f "$filename" ]; then echo "Error: File $filename already exists!"; exit 1; fi && cat > "$filename" << EOF
---
title: "$title"
date: $(date +'%Y-%m-%d')
draft: true
description: ""
---

EOF
echo "Created: $filename"
